root: ^I think I just need to talk to her.
^Yeah, I hate seeing her so sad. It makes me feel like a bad parent.
^You're not a bad parent. A bad parent would have left a long time ago.
^Even if you don't know what to do , just thinking about it shows you care.
^I know, but that's not a judgement I can rightfully make myself.
^To be fair, this isn't the type of thing any parent would expect to do.
^Yeah. "Child turning into roller coaster," wasn't in the parenting books.
